import React from"react";import{Card,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import axios from'axios';// Define the base URL
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Axios=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost/php-voting-api/'});function VotingCard(props){var team=props.team,voteid=props.voteid,set=props.set,get=props.get,votecount=props.votecount,remove=props.remove,unvoteid=props.unvoteid,add=props.add,subtract=props.subtract,setCand=props.setCand,name=props.name,check=props.check,addActvButn=props.addActvButn,getData=props.getData;function vote(){set(unvoteid);add(team.id);addActvButn(voteid);getData();};function unVote(){subtract(team.id);addActvButn(unvoteid);set(team.id);getData();remove();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:"18rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:"/assets/images/".concat(team.picture)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{id:voteid,variant:"success",disabled:check(voteid),onClick:function onClick(){return vote();},children:"Vote"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{id:unvoteid,variant:"success",disabled:check(unvoteid),onClick:function onClick(){return unVote();},children:"Unvote"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Footer,{children:["Vote count: ",votecount]})]});}export default VotingCard;
